case_title: NABI BAKHSH and others vs HOTE MUHAMMAD and others
laws_referenced: Section 8 of the Board of Revenue Act, 1957

review_petition.grounds: Ex parte decision, incorrect impleading of parties
review_petition.petitioners_request: Set aside order dated 1987-02-10 and decide revision afresh
review_petition.respondents_rebuttal: Affidavits submitted indicating satisfaction with the decision

final_decision.application_rejected: Petitioner No. 1's application to implead parties as respondents
final_decision.reason_for_rejection: Most petitioners wanted to withdraw the review petition
